ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] POST at most once
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The problem in my mind GET a cached ID and sharing it with someone else. If you want to serve IDs have clients use POST. cheers Bill

Jan Algermissen wrote:

> The problem with getting the IDs is of course that it violates GET's 
> idempotency (every GET will result in a new ID). OTH, IDs are cheap and 
> if we are not talking about hundreds of GETs per second to the factory, 
> it is propably not that bad at all. It is after all just a resource 
> changing over time


The problem in my mind GET a cached ID and sharing it with someone else. 
If you want to serve IDs have clients use POST.

cheers
Bill
